esconPortTable.name: esconPortTable
esconPortTable.description: Table of objects that describe an ESCON channel port.

esconPortEntry.name: esconPortEntry
esconPortEntry.description: Table of objects that describe an ESCON channel port. This table is indexed by ifIndex from MIB-II.

esconPortControlUnitLinkAddress.name: esconPortControlUnitLinkAddress
esconPortControlUnitLinkAddress.description: This address identifies the ESCON Director port to which the optical fiber from the ESCON device is attached.

esconPortInFiberStatus.name: esconPortInFiberStatus
esconPortInFiberStatus.description: Status of the fiber into this device from the host: inLoff = the light is off on the fiber into this device from the host inOls = the fiber into this device from the host is in an intermediate state between light-off and light-on inIdle = the fiber into this device from the host is in the light-on state, and is ready to transfer data from the host to this device inUnknown = the agent cannot determine the status of the fiber into this device from the host

esconPortOutFiberStatus.name: esconPortOutFiberStatus
esconPortOutFiberStatus.description: Status of the fiber out of this device to the host: outDisableReq = out disable obtained; the fiber out of this device into the host is not in the light-on state outDisableForced = out ESCON emits OLS; the fiber out of this device into the host is not in the light-on state outLoffForced = out ESCON forced light-off; the fiber out of this device into the host is not in the light-on state outOls = the fiber out of this device into the host is in an intermediate state between light-off and light-on outOlsforced = out ESCON forced OLS; the fiber out of this device into the host is not in the light-on state outEnable = the fiber out of this device into the host is in the light-on state, and is ready to transfer data from this device to the host outError = the status of the fiber out of this device to the host is none of those listed above. This is a state that should not occur

esconLinkTable.name: esconLinkTable
esconLinkTable.description: Table of objects that describe an ESCON channel link.

esconLinkEntry.name: esconLinkEntry
esconLinkEntry.description: Table of objects that describe an ESCON channel link. This table is indexed by ifIndex from MIB-II, by host link address, and by (host) partition number.

esconLinkHostLinkAddress.name: esconLinkHostLinkAddress
esconLinkHostLinkAddress.description: This address identifies the ESCON Director port to which the optical fiber between the ESCON Director and the host is attached.

esconLinkPartitionNumber.name: esconLinkPartitionNumber
esconLinkPartitionNumber.description: A number identifying a logical host within an actual host.

esconLinkStatus.name: esconLinkStatus
esconLinkStatus.description: Gives the status of the link: hlpNotEstab = Host Logical Path not established hlpEstab = Host Logical Path established hlpError = Host Logical Path error

esconStationTable.name: esconStationTable
esconStationTable.description: Table of objects that describe an ESCON channel station.

esconStationEntry.name: esconStationEntry
esconStationEntry.description: Table of objects that describe an ESCON channel station. This table is indexed by ifIndex from MIB-II, by host link address, by (host) partition number, and by ESCON device address.

esconStationHostLinkAddress.name: esconStationHostLinkAddress
esconStationHostLinkAddress.description: This address identifies the ESCON Director port to which the optical fiber between the ESCON Director and the host is attached.

esconStationPartitionNumber.name: esconStationPartitionNumber
esconStationPartitionNumber.description: A number identifying a logical host within an actual host.

esconStationDeviceAddress.name: esconStationDeviceAddress
esconStationDeviceAddress.description: A unique hexadecimal number allocated to each station on the same host link.

esconStationState.name: esconStationState
esconStationState.description: The current state of the station.

esconStationAttentionDelay.name: esconStationAttentionDelay
esconStationAttentionDelay.description: Specifies the amount of time in seconds that elapses from the receipt of a packet at an ESCON station (when no other packets are queued) before that station sends buffered data to the Host. An update to this object takes effect the next time the station establishes communications with the host.

esconStationAttentionTimeOut.name: esconStationAttentionTimeOut
esconStationAttentionTimeOut.description: Specifies the amount of time in seconds that the station is to wait for a response to an attention signal it sent to the host before initiating channel disconnect. An update to this object takes effect the next time the station establishes communications with the host.

esconStationMaxBfru.name: esconStationMaxBfru
esconStationMaxBfru.description: Number of buffers in the host buffer pool for receiving data from this station.

esconStationUnitSize.name: esconStationUnitSize
esconStationUnitSize.description: Maximum size of a buffer, in bytes, that the host can receive from this station.

esconStationMaxMsgSizeReceived.name: esconStationMaxMsgSizeReceived
esconStationMaxMsgSizeReceived.description: The maximum length of a message that can be received on this station. An update to this object takes effect the next time the station establishes communications with the host.

esconStationMaxMsgSizeSent.name: esconStationMaxMsgSizeSent
esconStationMaxMsgSizeSent.description: The maximum length of a message that can be sent from this station to the host. An update to this object takes effect the next time the station establishes communications with the host.

esconStationDataPacketsOkReceived.name: esconStationDataPacketsOkReceived
esconStationDataPacketsOkReceived.description: The number of data packets received from the host by this station without Data Check.

esconStationDataPacketsKoReceived.name: esconStationDataPacketsKoReceived
esconStationDataPacketsKoReceived.description: The number of data packets received from the host by this station with Data Check.

esconStationDataPacketsSent.name: esconStationDataPacketsSent
esconStationDataPacketsSent.description: The number of data packets sent to the host by this station.

esconStationTotalFramesSent.name: esconStationTotalFramesSent
esconStationTotalFramesSent.description: The number of data packets and control packets sent to the host by this station.

esconStationDataPacketsRetransmitted.name: esconStationDataPacketsRetransmitted
esconStationDataPacketsRetransmitted.description: The number of data packets retransmitted by this station

esconStationPositiveAckDataPackets.name: esconStationPositiveAckDataPackets
esconStationPositiveAckDataPackets.description: The number of data packets sent by this station to the host that the host has positively acknowledged. When the host sends a positive acknowledgement for a group of n data packets, this counter is incremented by n.

esconStationSecondChanceAttentions.name: esconStationSecondChanceAttentions
esconStationSecondChanceAttentions.description: The number of times this station has sent a Second Chance Attention signal to the host.

esconStationCommandsRetried.name: esconStationCommandsRetried
esconStationCommandsRetried.description: The number of times a command has been retried on this station
